attributes.action: Remove self indulgent MP’s from their seats by holding an election
attributes.additional_details:
MP’s have become a laughing stock of the nation. They are paid by us, we expect them to deliver our choices. They have failed miserably. For three years this country has become a shambolic mess. It’s time it stopped! 

Therefore we the people of the UK demand a General Election
attributes.background: "We the undersigned have lost all confidence in the current goverments ability to put the interests of the country and it's people first"
